summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackGood Molecules Squalane Oil is made with 100% plant-derived squalane to soften and seal in moisture for a healthy, hydrated complexion.
details: DetailsItem 2583063How To UseApply a few drops to skin in the morning and at night after serums and other treatments. Let absorb for 30 seconds. Suitable for daily use on all skin types.Ingredients100% Plant-Derived Squalane Oil.
how_to_use: Apply a few drops to skin in the morning and at night after serums and other treatments. Let absorb for 30 seconds. Suitable for daily use on all skin types.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would like this product again
reviews.comments: So good

reviews.headline: Small but mighty
reviews.comments: The oil comes in a small bottle, but that's exactly what makes it so great. You only need a few drops per use, so the product lasts much longer than it seems. I use 1-2 drops on my whole face. Its lightweight and absorbs beautifully into the skin without clogging pores. The smaller size also helps preserve the oil's freshness and prevents waste, which is a smart move considering how oils can oxidize over time. Don't let the size fool you! This little bottle packs a powerful punch of hydration and skin barrier support.

reviews.headline: It's like putting olive oil on your face.
reviews.comments:
Its thick in texture, doesnt apply nicely. Feels thick and heavy and sticky. If you're soemone who has flyaways it will 100% stick onto your face and feel gross and greasy all day. 

I bought it based on the reviews, this one and the hudrating one are just nasty feeling. I wanted that glow look with something with a little more umph and this was just way too much. And i have a dry face.

reviews.headline: TINY MINIATURE BOTTLE
reviews.comments: Y'all. This bottle is so tiny. I mean its like not even sample size. The bottle is SO tiny. And its only like 2/3 of the way filled. Such a disappointment. I should have read the ounces, but this is my warning to you, whoever is reading this. YOU WILL RECIEVE A TEENY TINY LITTLE BITTY VIAL!

reviews.headline: Small but mighty
reviews.comments: Yes, it's a very small bottle and dropper but it's great for control and traveling. This oil packs a punch and for the price compared to higher ends, you can't go wrong. I do wish they make a bigger bottle, just bc I LOVE it so much. I use day and night. My under eyes just Thank you! I used a  banana brighten cream under my eyes which ended up drying them out so bad, I thought they were damaged forever. Thanks to this oil, my under eyes are back and better. I use the Bakuchiol oil for dry skin with this and MAGIC!!

reviews.headline: Squalene oil
reviews.comments: It's very light and very blendable and easy to use with Foundation or concealer.

reviews.headline: great hydration
reviews.comments: Use as a base for other treatments

reviews.headline: This Bottle is a Joke
reviews.comments: Not sure why I can't add a photo but this bottle and dropper is tiny. I'm normally not one to complain about packaging but not only is it a terrible value - go buy the Ordinary  - but it is so small it's like playing with a doll toy. This was really hard to open and hold the itty bitty child size dropper. I'm so disappointed, I wish I just stuck with the Ordinary. The oil is the same as any squaline, squaline is my go-to face oil since the Ordinary discontinued their "B" oil. It's light enough but also hydrating.

reviews.headline: Love this oil
reviews.comments: Love this oil - feels like it matches the oil consistency of my face so it hydrates it super well but doesn't make me feel greasy.

reviews.headline: Adds a bit of moisture as the cold weather still has a hold.
reviews.comments: Adds extra moisture without being oily. Absorbs quickly, easy application, doesn't take more than a few drops for the w tire face and neck.

reviews.headline: New Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I've had this product for a week and it's 100% my new Holy Grail product. I bought it as an oil to remove sebum plugs. Put a bunch on my face and neck and massages for ~10min. Got out some plugs, but I could not stop touching my face after I washed it off. So soft! My under eyes looked better than after the past 6 eye creams I've tried. Now I'm using it 2x a day as directed and back to stock up.

reviews.headline: Very moisturizing
reviews.comments: So far so good.  Works great undereyes when I mix wih concealer to help with cakeyness!

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: Super light and absorbs fast, doesn't leave a greasy mess.  I mix it with a pink concealer to cover up the blue under my eyes.  For the price I highly recommend this product.  If I put too much on my hands I rub the remainder on the back of my hands and finish with a lotion.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I have really dry skin on my t zone area and this product hydrates my skin so well! 10/10 and it leaves your skin feeling soft. If you're hesitant in buying, don't be. I highly recommend it especially coming from someone with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Helped with my face dry patches.
reviews.comments: I was going through a  stage of really bad dry skin. I started using this at night and my regular moisturizer at day. My skin looks hydrated smooth and youthful. Definitely repurchasing. Yes the bottle is small but completely worth it.

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin & pre makeup prep
reviews.comments: I have extremely dry skin especially when I'm using any form of acne treatment or retinol. This face oil really helped heal and hydrate my skin. Honestly I've been having less acne since I started using it. I use it at night and in the morning and let it absorb for about 20 minutes before I add primer and my foundation. It helps my skin not completely dry up during the day under my make up

reviews.headline: Hydrating to the skin
reviews.comments: It instantly hydrated my skin. I waited awhile before leaving my review to see if I actually noticed continued results which I did. My skin is more hydrated and less dry. Recommend at this price point.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing Oil
reviews.comments: I like to use this oil and the rosehip oil after my serums before my moisturizer. I warm it up in my hands then pat into my face, neck and chest. It feels so warm and moisturizing. I usually need a full dropper or two for a full application (my skin is very dry and I like to minimize drag as I'm applying). I wish they offered a larger size. It's so tiny. I feel like I'm mostly just paying for the glass bottle. Please GM, make larger sizes for all of your products! I love this brand but I hate having to constantly keep inventory of them and repurchase.

reviews.headline: Great for Gua Sha
reviews.comments: I needed a simple facial oil and I wanted something with simple ingredients, this has worked great it's very hydrating. I will say I have to let it sit for a bit before applying makeup if I use it in the morning rather than at night because it can be a little oily on the face, but it absorbs well in 10-20 minutes.

reviews.headline: Great for layering moisture!
reviews.comments: I have hormonal acne and oily skin and this still is a great product for me! I've been using it as the last step after serums and it's just enough moisture to seal everything in without any greasy or heavy feel. Perfect for winter!

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: Combo skin, more oily than dry, but sensitive

display_values: Combo skin, more oily than dry, but sensitive

faceoff_positive.comments: Good Molecules hit it out of the park with their Sqalane oil made from olives. I would buy it by the gallon if that was possible and use it on my entire body from head to toe. I have even used it on a recent brown recluse spider bite that healed it up in about a week. Back to the main reason I use it, my face, I put it on at the very end of my nightly regimen all Good Molecules and it makes my face feel like velvet. If I don't feel like using everything on some nights I just use it. Also I have noticed my middle 60's face losing wrinkles. I'm not hunting for them either! Absolutely the best face product ever and if your on a tight budget I would def recommend buying this one product. It has multiple uses for your entire body and hair. LOVE LOVE LOVE
faceoff_positive.headline: Favorite Face Product

faceoff_negative.comments: Not sure why I can't add a photo but this bottle and dropper is tiny. I'm normally not one to complain about packaging but not only is it a terrible value - go buy the Ordinary  - but it is so small it's like playing with a doll toy. This was really hard to open and hold the itty bitty child size dropper. I'm so disappointed, I wish I just stuck with the Ordinary. The oil is the same as any squaline, squaline is my go-to face oil since the Ordinary discontinued their "B" oil. It's light enough but also hydrating.
